{{Description|These creatures dwell within The Chasm, absorbing the energies of the strange stones within and emitting a dim light. Because they give off light, they are loved by miners and concerned a good omen, thus their term "Lucklight." After all, any light in such darkness is to be treasured.<br />When "something strange" was unearthed in The Chasm, their numbers also began to increase greatly.|[[Archive]] Description}}
'''Lucklight Flies''' are creatures found in the [[The Chasm/Underground Mines|Underground Mines]] of [[The Chasm]]. It can be found both as [[Wildlife]] and as a pet for the [[Serenitea Pot]]. When collected, they will restore 1 energy to the [[Lumenstone Adjuvant]].

See the [https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html?bbs_presentation_style=no_header&lang=en-us#/map/9?shown_types=350 Official Interactive Map] for specific locations.
